definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: The third chapter cleans up the syllabary of Gengkou dialect.
sentences.chinese: 第三章整理出了岳阳县筻口镇话的同音字汇。

sentences.english: Homophones are the universal and very important phenomena in languages.
sentences.chinese: 同音词是语言中极其重要而又十分普遍的现象。

sentences.english: The third talks about polysemy and its relation to homonymy , etc.
sentences.chinese: 第三节阐释了多义现象以及多义和同音的关系等。

sentences.english: I can't stand when typing, encounter a homophone in the first place is his name.
sentences.chinese: 我受不了打字时，遇到同音字在首位的是他名字。

sentences.english: "Dao", inversion and arrival, is homophone in Mandarin Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 因为在普通话里“倒”和“到”是同音字。

sentences.english: The second part is about the tables of Chinese characters with homophone.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是孝南方言同音字表。

sentences.english: There are so many homophones in Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 汉语里的同音字真是太多了。

sentences.english: Homonym problem was put forward in the course of Chinese reform of a writing system.
sentences.chinese: 同音词问题是在中国文字改革的过程中提出来的。

sentences.english: This is true even in homonyms.
sentences.chinese: 即使是同音词也是如此。

sentences.english: The Chinese word for fish sounds like the word for abundance, says Lum.
sentences.chinese: 林解释道，中文里，“鱼”和“余”同音。

sentences.english: Secondly, we have analysed the reason why the homonym produces .
sentences.chinese: 其次，分析了同音词产生的原因。

sentences.english: This paper studies the phonology of the Pinghua dialect of Hunan Province's Tongdao County and lists the homophones.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍湖南通道平话的音系，并列出同音字汇。

sentences.english: In Chinese society, the homonyms of numbers hold deep meaning.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，数字的同音含有深刻的含义。

sentences.english: Don't waste my time, tell me what is homonyms?
sentences.chinese: 不要浪费我的时间，告诉我什么是同音字？

sentences.english: We conclude that grammaticalization and loan homonym are the main source of conjunction.
sentences.chinese: 我们考察发现虚化和同音假借是连词的主要来源。

sentences.english: Users wrote homonyms for Mr Liu’s name, or abbreviations in Latin characters.
sentences.chinese: 用户们写的是刘先生的同音字，或者拉丁字母缩写。

definition: pronunciation/literary (rather than colloquial) pronunciation of a Chinese character
phonetic loan character/using one character interchangeably for phonetically related characters
original form of a Chinese character
reading or phonetic value of a character
loan character (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/character acquiring meanings by phonetic association/also called phonetic loan
component of a Chinese character (as the radical or the phonetic part)
falling tone/fourth tone in modern Mandarin
character with two or more readings
